SolidColorBrush(Colors.White), 30);Di2015NewLine        materialGroup.Children.Add(specMat);Di2015NewLine        return materialGroup;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ModelVisual3D GetCube(MaterialGroup materialGroup, Point3D point, Size3D size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var farPoint = new Point3D(point.X - (size.X / 2), point.Y - (size.Y / 2), point.Z - (size.Z / 2));Di2015NewLine        var nearPoint = new Point3D(point.X + (size.X / 2), point.Y + (size.Y / 2), point.Z + (size.Z / 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var cube = new Model3DGroup();Di2015NewLine        var p0 = new Point3D(farPoint.X, farPoint.Y, farPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        var p1 = new Point3D(nearPoint.X, farPoint.Y, farPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        var p2 = new Point3D(nearPoint.X, farPoint.Y, nearPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        var p3 = new Point3D(farPoint.X, farPoint.Y, nearPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        var p4 = new Point3D(farPoint.X, nearPoint.Y, farPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        var p5 = new Point3D(nearPoint.X, nearPoint.Y, farPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        var p6 = new Point3D(nearPoint.X, nearPoint.Y, nearPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        var p7 = new Point3D(farPoint.X, nearPoint.Y, nearPoint.Z);Di2015NewLine        //front side trianglesDi2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p3, p2, p6));Di2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p3, p6, p7));Di2015NewLine        //right side trianglesDi2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p2, p1, p5));Di2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p2, p5, p6));Di2015NewLine        //back side trianglesDi2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p1, p0, p4));Di2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p1, p4, p5));Di2015NewLine        //left side trianglesDi2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p0, p3, p7));Di2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p0, p7, p4));Di2015NewLine        //top side trianglesDi2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p7, p6, p5));Di2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p7, p5, p4));Di2015NewLine        //bottom side trianglesDi2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p2, p3, p0));Di2015NewLine        cube.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, p2, p0, p1));Di2015NewLine        var model = new ModelVisual3D();Di2015NewLine        model.Content = cube;Di2015NewLine        return model;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Model3DGroup CreateTriangleModel(MaterialGroup materialGroup, Triangle triangle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, triangle.P0, triangle.P1, triangle.P2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Model3DGroup CreateTriangleModel(Material material, Point3D p0, Point3D p1, Point3D p2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mesh = new MeshGeometry3D();Di2015NewLine        mesh.Positions.Add(p0);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Positions.Add(p1);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Positions.Add(p2);Di2015NewLine        mesh.TriangleIndices.Add(0);Di2015NewLine        mesh.TriangleIndices.Add(1);Di2015NewLine        mesh.TriangleIndices.Add(2);Di2015NewLine        var normal = CalculateNormal(p0, p1, p2);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Normals.Add(normal);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Normals.Add(normal);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Normals.Add(normal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var model = new GeometryModel3D(mesh, material);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var group = new Model3DGroup();Di2015NewLine        group.Children.Add(model);Di2015NewLine        return group;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Vector3D CalculateNormal(Point3D p0, Point3D p1, Point3D p2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var v0 = new Vector3D(p1.X - p0.X, p1.Y - p0.Y, p1.Z - p0.Z);Di2015NewLine        var v1 = new Vector3D(p2.X - p1.X, p2.Y - p1.Y, p2.Z - p1.Z);Di2015NewLine        return Vector3D.CrossProduct(v0, v1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Transform(double adjustBy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _angle += adjustBy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rotateTransform3D = new RotateTransform3D { CenterX = 0, CenterZ = 0 };Di2015NewLine        var axisAngleRotation3D = new AxisAngleRotation3D { Axis = new Vector3D(1, 1, 1), Angle = _angle };Di2015NewLine        rotateTransform3D.Rotation = axisAngleRotation3D;Di2015NewLine        var myTransform3DGroup = new Transform3DGroup();Di2015NewLine        myTransform3DGroup.Children.Add(rotateTransform3D);Di2015NewLine        _models.ForEach(x => x.Transform = myTransform3DGroup);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ModelVisual3D GetCylinder(MaterialGroup materialGroup, Point3D midPoint, double radius, double depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cylinder = new Model3DGroup();Di2015NewLine        var nearCircle = new CircleAssitor();Di2015NewLine        var farCircle = new CircleAssitor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var twoPi = Math.PI * 2;Di2015NewLine        var firstPass = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double x;Di2015NewLine        double y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var increment = 0.1d;Di2015NewLine        for (double i = 0; i < twoPi + increment; i = i + increment)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            x = (radius * Math.Cos(i));Di2015NewLine            y = (-radius * Math.Sin(i));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P0 = midPoint;Di2015NewLine            farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P1 = farCircle.LastPoint;Di2015NewLine            farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P2 = new Point3D(x + midPoint.X, y + midPoint.Y, midPoint.Z);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            nearCircle.CurrentTriangle = farCircle.CurrentTriangle.Clone(depth, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!firstPass)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cylinder.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, farCircle.CurrentTriangle));Di2015NewLine                cylinder.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, nearCircle.CurrentTriangle));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cylinder.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P2, farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P1, nearCircle.CurrentTriangle.P2));Di2015NewLine                cylinder.Children.Add(CreateTriangleModel(materialGroup, nearCircle.CurrentTriangle.P2, nearCircle.CurrentTriangle.P1, farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P2));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                farCircle.FirstPoint = farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P1;Di2015NewLine                nearCircle.FirstPoint = nearCircle.CurrentTriangle.P1;Di2015NewLine                firstPass = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            farCircle.LastPoint = farCircle.CurrentTriangle.P2;Di2015NewLine            nearCircle.LastPoint = nearCircle.CurrentTriangle.P2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var model = new ModelVisual3D { Content = cylinder };Di2015NewLine        return model;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ModelVisual3D CreateSphere(Point3D center, double radius, int u, int v, Color color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Model3DGroup spear = new Model3DGroup();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (u < 2 || v < 2)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        Point3D[,] pts = new Point3D[u, v];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < u; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < v; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pts[i, j] = GetPosition(radius,Di2015NewLine                i * 180 / (u - 1), j * 360 / (v - 1));Di2015NewLine                pts[i, j] += (Vector3D)center;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point3D[] p = new Point3D[4];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < u - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < v - 1; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                p[0] = pts[i, j];Di2015NewLine                p[1] = pts[i + 1, j];Di2015NewLine                p[2] = pts[i + 1, j + 1];Di2015NewLine                p[3] = pts[i, j + 1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine        ModelVisual3D model = new ModelVisual3D();Di2015NewLine        model.Content = spear;Di2015NewLine        return model;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Point3D GetPosition(double radius, double theta, double phi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point3D pt = new Point3D();Di2015NewLine        double snt = Math.Sin(theta * Math.PI / 180);Di2015NewLine        double cnt = Math.Cos(theta * Math.PI / 180);Di2015NewLine        double snp = Math.Sin(phi * Math.PI / 180);Di2015NewLine        double cnp = Math.Cos(phi * Math.PI / 180);Di2015NewLine        pt.X = radius * snt * cnp;Di2015NewLine        pt.Y = radius * cnt;Di2015NewLine        pt.Z = -radius * snt * snp;Di2015NewLine        return pt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Model3DGroup CreateTriangleFace(Point3D p0, Point3D p1, Point3D p2, Color color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MeshGeometry3D mesh = new MeshGeometry3D(); mesh.Normals.Add(normal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Material material = new DiffuseMaterial(Di2015NewLine            new SolidColorBrush(color));Di2015NewLine        GeometryModel3D model = new GeometryModel3D(Di2015NewLine            mesh, material);Di2015NewLine        Model3DGroup group = new Model3DGroup();Di2015NewLine        group.Children.Add(model);Di2015NewLine        return group;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class VectorHelperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static Vector3D CalcNormal(Point3D p0, Point3D p1, Point3D p2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Vector3D v0 = new Vector3D(p1.X - p0.X, p1.Y - p0.Y, p1.Z - p0.Z);Di2015NewLine            Vector3D v1 = new Vector3D(p2.X - p1.X, p2.Y - p1.Y, p2.Z - p1.Z);Di2015NewLine            return Vector3D.CrossProduct(v0, v1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class 1287028Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DownloaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int size = 4096 * 1024;Di2015NewLine    ManualResetEvent done = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    Socket socket;Di2015NewLine    Stream stream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void InternalWrite(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var read = socket.EndReceive(ar);Di2015NewLine        if (read == size)Di2015NewLine            InternalRead();Di2015NewLine        stream.Write((byte[])ar.AsyncState, 0, read);Di2015NewLine        if (read != size)Di2015NewLine            done.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void InternalRead()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new byte[size];Di2015NewLine        socket.BeginReceive(buffer, 0, size, System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.None, InternalWrite, buffer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Save(Socket socket, Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.socket = socket;Di2015NewLine        this.stream = stream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        InternalRead();Di2015NewLine        return done.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool Save(System.Net.Sockets.Socket socket, string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = File.OpenWrite(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var downloader = new Downloader();Di2015NewLine        return downloader.Save(socket, stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1287572Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom
1287572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T[] elements = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    // Note i > 0 to avoid final pointless iterationDi2015NewLine    for (int i = elements.Length-1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Swap element "i" with a random earlier element it (or itself)Di2015NewLine        int swapIndex = rng.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLine        T tmp = elements[i];Di2015NewLine        elements[i] = elements[swapIndex];Di2015NewLine        elements[swapIndex] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Lazily yield (avoiding aliasing issues etc)Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in elements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return element;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1287572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Shuffle<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  T[] elements = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine  for (int i = elements.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Swap element "i" with a random earlier element it (or itself)Di2015NewLine        // ... except we don't really need to swap it fully, as we canDi2015NewLine        // return it immediately, and afterwards it's irrelevant.Di2015NewLine    int swapIndex = rng.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLine        yield return elements[swapIndex];Di2015NewLine    elements[swapIndex] = elements[i];Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1289089Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class URLDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex feet = new Regex(@"([0-9]\\s?)'([^'])", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex inch1 = new Regex(@"([0-9]\\s?)''", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex inch2 = new Regex(@"([0-9]\\s?)""", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex num = new Regex(@"#([0-9]+)", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex dollar = new Regex(@"[$]([0-9]+)", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex percent = new Regex(@"([0-9]+)%", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex sep = new Regex(@"[\\s_/\\\\+:.]", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex empty = new Regex(@"[^-A-Za-z0-9]", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    static readonly Regex extra = new Regex(@"[-]+", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string PrepareURL(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        str = str.Trim().ToLower();Di2015NewLine        str = str.Replace("&", "and");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        str = feet.Replace(str, "$1-ft-");Di2015NewLine        str = inch1.Replace(str, "$1-in-");Di2015NewLine        str = inch2.Replace(str, "$1-in-");Di2015NewLine        str = num.Replace(str, "num-$1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        str = dollar.Replace(str, "$1-dollar-");Di2015NewLine        str = percent.Replace(str, "$1-percent-");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        str = sep.Replace(str, "-");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        str = empty.Replace(str, string.Empty);Di2015NewLine        str = extra.Replace(str, "-");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        str = str.Trim('-');Di2015NewLine        return str;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1289173Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> ReadLines(Stream input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Note: don't close the StreamReader - we don't own the stream!Di2015NewLine    StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(input);Di2015NewLine    string line;Di2015NewLine    while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return line;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1293120Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = 10;Di2015NewLine        PassByRef(ref i);Di2015NewLine        // Now i is 20Di2015NewLine        PassByValue(i);Di2015NewLine        // i is *still* 20Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void PassByRef(ref int x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x = 20;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void PassByValue(int x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x = 50;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1293120Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        PassByRef(ref builder);Di2015NewLine        // builder now refers to the StringBuilderDi2015NewLine        // constructed in PassByRefDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PassByValueChangeContents(builder);Di2015NewLine        // builder still refers to the same StringBuilderDi2015NewLine        // but then contents has changedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PassByValueChangeParameter(builder);Di2015NewLine        // builder still refers to the same StringBuilder,Di2015NewLine        // not the new one created in PassByValueChangeParameterDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void PassByRef(ref StringBuilder x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x = new StringBuilder("Created in PassByRef");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void PassByValueChangeContents(StringBuilder x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x.Append(" ... and changed in PassByValueChangeContents");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void PassByValueChangeParameter(StringBuilder x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This new object won't be "seen" by the callerDi2015NewLine        x = new StringBuilder("Created in PassByValueChangeParameter");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1304394Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing NUnit.Framework;Di2015NewLineusing ProtoBuf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[TestFixture]Di2015NewLinepublic class ComplexGenericTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void TestX()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Query query = new X { Result = "abc" };Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(typeof(string), query.GetQueryType());Di2015NewLine        Query clone = Serializer.DeepClone<Query>(query);Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsNotNull(clone);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreNotSame(clone, query);Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsInstanceOfType(query.GetType(), clone);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(((X)query).Result, ((X)clone).Result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void TestY()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Query query = new Y { Result = 1234};Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(typeof(int), query.GetQueryType());Di2015NewLine        Query clone = Serializer.DeepClone<Query>(query);Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsNotNull(clone);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreNotSame(clone, query);Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsInstanceOfType(query.GetType(), clone);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(((Y)query).Result, ((Y)clone).Result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static class QueryExt {Di2015NewLine    public static Type GetQueryType(this IQuery query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (query == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("query");Di2015NewLine        foreach (Type type in query.GetType().GetInterfaces())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type.IsGenericTypeDi2015NewLine                && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IQuery<>))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return type.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("No typed query implemented", "query");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic interface IQueryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Result { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic interface IQuery<T> : IQueryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    new T Result { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(21, typeof(W))]Di2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(22, typeof(X))]Di2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(23, typeof(Y))]Di2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(25, typeof(SpecialQuery))]Di2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLineabstract class Query : IQueryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string ResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return ResultString; }Di2015NewLine        set { ResultString = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected abstract string ResultString { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // these are to allow simple ResultString implementationsDi2015NewLine    // without the codegen having to worry about int.Parse etcDi2015NewLine    protected static string FormatQueryString<T>(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(typeof(T))Di2015NewLine            .ConvertToInvariantString(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected static T ParseQueryString<T>(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T) TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(typeof(T))Di2015NewLine            .ConvertFromInvariantString(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLine[ProtoInclude(21, typeof(Z))]Di2015NewLineabstract class SpecialQuery : Query, IQuery<DataSet>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public new DataSet Result { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine    protected override string ResultStringDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            if (Result == null) return null;Di2015NewLine            using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Result.WriteXml(sw, XmlWriteMode.WriteSchema);Di2015NewLine                return sw.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        set {Di2015NewLine            if (value == null) { Result = null; return; }Di2015NewLine            using (StringReader sr = new StringReader(value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataSet ds = new DataSet();Di2015NewLine                ds.ReadXml(sr, XmlReadMode.ReadSchema);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLineclass W : Query, IQuery<bool>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine    public new bool Result { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override string ResultStringDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get {return FormatQueryString(Result); }Di2015NewLine        set { Result = 1305472Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void Render(HtmlTextWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         if (!Page.IsPostBack)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (System.IO.MemoryStream stream = new System.IO.MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (System.IO.StreamWriter streamWriter = new System.IO.StreamWriter(stream))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HtmlTextWriter htmlWriter = new HtmlTextWriter(streamWriter);Di2015NewLine                    base.Render(htmlWriter);Di2015NewLine                    htmlWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine                    stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                    using (System.IO.StreamReader oReader = new System.IO.StreamReader(stream))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string pageContent = oReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                        pageContent = ParseTagsFromPage(pageContent);Di2015NewLine                        writer.Write(pageContent);Di2015NewLine                        oReader.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.Render(writer);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
1305472Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string ParseTagsFromPage(string pageContent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string regexPattern = "{zeus:(.*?)}"; //matches {zeus:anytagname}Di2015NewLine        string tagName = "";Di2015NewLine        string fieldName = "";Di2015NewLine        string replacement = "";Di2015NewLine        MatchCollection tagMatches = Regex.Matches(pageContent, regexPattern);Di2015NewLine        foreach (Match match in tagMatches)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tagName = match.ToString();Di2015NewLine            fieldName = tagName.Replace("{zeus:", "").Replace("}", "");Di2015NewLine            //get data based on my found field name, using some other function callDi2015NewLine            replacement = GetFieldValue(fieldName); Di2015NewLine            pageContent = pageContent.Replace(tagName, replacement);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return pageContent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1306456Di2015UniqueSeparatorHttpWebRequest
1306456Di2015UniqueSeparatorHttpWebResponse
1306456Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool Connect() {Di2015NewLine   if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(_Username)) { base.ThrowHelper(new SessionException("Username not specified.")); } Di2015NewLine   if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(_Password)) { base.ThrowHelper(new SessionException("Password not specified.")); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   _Cookies = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine   HtmlWeb webFetcher = new HtmlWeb();Di2015NewLine   webFetcher.UsingCache = false;Di2015NewLine   webFetcher.UseCookies = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   HtmlWeb.PreRequestHandler justSetCookies = delegate(HttpWebRequest webRequest) {Di2015NewLine      SetRequestHeaders(webRequest, false);Di2015NewLine      return true;Di2015NewLine   };Di2015NewLine   HtmlWeb.PreRequestHandler postLoginInformation = delegate(HttpWebRequest webRequest) {Di2015NewLine      SetRequestHeaders(webRequest, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // before we let webGrabber get the response from the server, we must POST the login form's dataDi2015NewLine      // This posted form data is *VERY* specific to the web site in question, and it must be exactly right,Di2015NewLine      // and exactly what the remote server is expecting, otherwise it will not work!Di2015NewLine      //Di2015NewLine      // You need to use an HTTP proxy/debugger such as Fiddler in order to adequately inspect the Di2015NewLine      // posted form data. Di2015NewLine      ASCIIEncoding encoding = new ASCIIEncoding();Di2015NewLine      string postDataString = string.Format("edit%5Bname%5D={0}&edit%5Bpass%5D={1}&edit%5Bform_id%5D=user_login&op=Log+in", _Username, _Password);Di2015NewLine      byte[] postData = encoding.GetBytes(postDataString);Di2015NewLine      webRequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine      webRequest.ContentLength = postData.Length;Di2015NewLine      webRequest.Referer = Util.MakeUrlCore("/user"); // builds a proper-for-this-website referer stringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using (Stream postStream = webRequest.GetRequestStream()) {Di2015NewLine         postStream.Write(postData, 0, postData.Length);Di2015NewLine         postStream.Close();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return true;Di2015NewLine   };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   string loginUrl = Util.GetUrlCore(ProjectUrl.Login); Di2015NewLine   bool atEndOfRedirects = false;Di2015NewLine   string method = "POST";Di2015NewLine   webFetcher.PreRequest = postLoginInformation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // this is trimmed...this was trimmed in order to handle one of those 'interesting' Di2015NewLine   // login processes...Di2015NewLine   webFetcher.PostResponse = delegate(HttpWebRequest webRequest, HttpWebResponse response) {Di2015NewLine      if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Found) {Di2015NewLine         // the login process is forwarding us on...update the URL to move to...Di2015NewLine         loginUrl = response.Headers["Location"] as String;Di2015NewLine         method = "GET";Di2015NewLine         webFetcher.PreRequest = justSetCookies; // we only need to post cookies now, not all the login infoDi2015NewLine      } else {Di2015NewLine         atEndOfRedirects = true;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      foreach (Cookie cookie in response.Cookies) {Di2015NewLine         // *snip*Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Real work starts here:Di2015NewLine   HtmlDocument retrievedDocument = null;Di2015NewLine   while (!atEndOfRedirects) {Di2015NewLine      retrievedDocument = webFetcher.Load(loginUrl, method);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // ok, we're fully logged in.  Check the returned HTML to see if we're sitting at an error page, orDi2015NewLine   // if we're successfully logged in.Di2015NewLine   if (retrievedDocument != null) {Di2015NewLine      HtmlNode errorNode = retrievedDocument.DocumentNode.SelectSingleNode("//div[contains(@class, 'error')]");Di2015NewLine      if (errorNode != null) { return false; }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return true; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void SetRequestHeaders(HttpWebRequest webRequest) { SetRequestHeaders(webRequest, true); }Di2015NewLinepublic void SetRequestHeaders(HttpWebRequest webRequest, bool allowAutoRedirect) {Di2015NewLine   try {Di2015NewLine      webRequest.AllowAutoRedirect = allowAutoRedirect;Di2015NewLine      webRequest.CookieContainer = _Cookies;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // the rest of this stuff is just to try and make our request *look* like FireFox. Di2015NewLine      webRequest.UserAgent = @"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.3) Gecko/20070309 Firefox/2.0.0.3";Di2015NewLine      webRequest.Accept = @"text/xml,application/xml,application/xhtml+xml,text/html;q=0.9,text/plain;q=0.8,image/png,*/*;q=0.5";Di2015NewLine      webRequest.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine      webRequest.Headers.Add(@"Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5");Di2015NewLine      //webRequest.Headers.Add(@"Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   catch (Exception ex) { base.ThrowHelper(ex); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1307719Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace Kannon.StateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// ReferenceDefinition describes the layout of the reference in general.Di2015NewLine    /// It tells what states it should have, and stores the stream buffers for later serialization.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [ProtoBuf.ProtoContract]Di2015NewLine    public class ReferenceDefinitionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// There are several built in state types, as well as rudimentary support for a "Generic" state.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public enum StateTypeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Graphics=0,Di2015NewLine            Audio,Di2015NewLine            Mind,Di2015NewLine            Physics,Di2015NewLine            Network,Di2015NewLine            GenericDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Represents what states should be present in the ReferenceDefinitionDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        [ProtoBuf.ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine        List<StateType> m_StatesPresent = new List<StateType>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Represent a list of StateDefinitions, which hold the buffers for each different type of state.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        [ProtoBuf.ProtoMember(2)]Di2015NewLine        List<StateDefinition> m_StateDefinition = new List<StateDefinition>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Add a state, mapped to a type, to this reference definition.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="type">Type of state to add</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="def">State definition to add.</param>Di2015NewLine        public void AddState(StateType type, StateDefinition def)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Enforce only 1 of each type, except for Generic, which can have as many as it wants.Di2015NewLine            if (m_StatesPresent.Contains(type) && type != StateType.Generic)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            m_StatesPresent.Add(type);Di2015NewLine            m_StateDefinition.Add(def);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents a definition of some gamestate, storing protobuffered data to be remapped to the state.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [ProtoBuf.ProtoContract]Di2015NewLine    public class StateDefinitionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Name of the stateDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        [ProtoBuf.ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine        string m_StateName;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Byte array to store the "data" for later serialization.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        [ProtoBuf.ProtoMember(2)]Di2015NewLine        byte[] m_Buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Constructor for the state definition, protected to enforce the Pack and Unpack functionality to keep things safe.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="name">Name of the state type.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="buff">byte buffer to build state off of</param>Di2015NewLine        protected StateDefinition(String name, byte[] buff)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_StateName = name;Di2015NewLine            m_Buffer = buff;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Unpack a StateDefinition into a GameStateDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T">Gamestate type to unpack into.  Must define Protobuf Contracts.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="def">State Definition to unpack.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>The unpacked state data.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static T Unpack<T>(StateDefinition def) where T:GameStateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Make sure we're unpacking into the right state type.Di2015NewLine            if (typeof(T).Name == def.m_StateName)Di2015NewLine                return ProtoBuf.Serializer.Deserialize<T>(new MemoryStream(def.m_Buffer));Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                // Otherwise, return the equivalent of Null.Di2015NewLine                return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Pack a state type into a State DefinitionDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T">Gamestate to package up.  Upst define protobuf contracts.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="state">State to pack up.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A state definition serialized from the passed in state.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static StateDefinition Pack<T>(T state) where T:GameStateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Using a memory stream, to make sure Garbage Collection knows what's going on.Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream s = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProtoBuf.Serializer.Serialize<T>(s, state);Di2015NewLine                // Uses typeof(T).Name to do semi-enforcement of type safety.  Not the best, but it works.Di2015NewLine                return new StateDefinition(typeof(T).Name, s.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

== null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int queueCount;Di2015NewLine                    lock (queue)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    currentBlockPos = 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (currentBlock == null)Di2015NewLine                    return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int read = Math.Min(count, currentBlock.Length - currentBlockPos);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(currentBlock, currentBlockPos, 1319016Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected ManualResetEvent threadStop = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void ReadData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     SerialPort serialPort = null;Di2015NewLine     tryDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         serialPort = SetupSerialPort(_serialPortSettings);Di2015NewLine         serialPort.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         string data;Di2015NewLine         while (serialPort.IsOpen)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             tryDi2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 data = serialPort.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                 if (data.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                     ReceivedData(serialPort, new ReceivedDataEventArgs(data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine             catch (TimeoutException)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 //  No actionDi2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             // WaitOne(0) tests whether the event was set and returns TRUEDi2015NewLine             //   if it was set and FALSE otherwise.Di2015NewLine             // The 0 tells the manual reset event to only check if it was setDi2015NewLine             //   and return immediately, otherwise if the number is greater thanDi2015NewLine             //   0 it will wait for that many milliseconds for the event to be setDi2015NewLine             //   and only then return - effectively blocking your thread for thatDi2015NewLine             //   period of timeDi2015NewLine             if (threadStop.WaitOne(0))Di2015NewLine                 break;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     catch (Exception exc)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         // you can do something here in case of an exceptionDi2015NewLine         // but a ThreadAbortedException should't be thrown any more if youDi2015NewLine         // stop using Thread.Abort and rely on the ManualResetEvent insteadDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     finallyDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         if (serialPort != null)Di2015NewLine             serialPort.Close();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void Stop()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Set the manual reset event to a "signaled" state --> will cause theDi2015NewLine    //   WaitOne function to return TRUEDi2015NewLine    threadStop.Set();Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

1322103Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic readonly Regex rePattern = new Regex(Di2015NewLine    @"(\\{+)([^\\}]+)(\\}+)", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLinestatic string Format(string pattern, object template)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (template == null) throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLine    Type type = template.GetType();Di2015NewLine    var cache = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    return rePattern.Replace(pattern, match =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lCount = match.Groups[1].Value.Length,Di2015NewLine            rCount = match.Groups[3].Value.Length;Di2015NewLine        if ((lCount % 2) != (rCount % 2)) throw new InvalidOperationException("Unbalanced braces");Di2015NewLine        string lBrace = lCount == 1 ? "" : new string('{', lCount / 2),Di2015NewLine            rBrace = rCount == 1 ? "" : new string('}', rCount / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string key = match.Groups[2].Value, value;Di2015NewLine        if(lCount % 2 == 0) {Di2015NewLine            value = key;Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            if (!cache.TryGetValue(key, out value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prop = type.GetProperty(key);Di2015NewLine                if (prop == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("Not found: " + key, "pattern");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                value = Convert.ToString(prop.GetValue(template, null));Di2015NewLine                cache.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return lBrace + value + rBrace;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1324893Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression
1324893Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TInput, bool>> CreateFilterExpression<TInput>(Di2015NewLine                                                   IEnumerable<Filter> filters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TInput), "");Di2015NewLine    Expression lambdaBody = null;Di2015NewLine    if (filters != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Filter filter in filters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression compareExpression = Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Property(param, filter.FieldName),Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Constant(filter.FilterString));Di2015NewLine            if (lambdaBody == null)Di2015NewLine                lambdaBody = compareExpression;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                lambdaBody = Expression.Or(lambdaBody, compareExpression);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (lambdaBody == null)Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TInput, bool>>(Expression.Constant(false));Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TInput, bool>>(lambdaBody, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1327639Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RadixSort(int[] a)Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine        // our helper array Di2015NewLine\int[] t=new int[a.Length]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// number of bits our group will be long Di2015NewLine\int r=4; // try to set this also to 2, 8 or 16 to see if it is Di2015NewLine                     //quicker or not Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// number of bits of a C# int Di2015NewLine\int b=32; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// counting and prefix arraysDi2015NewLine\// (note dimensions 2^r which is the number of all possible values of a Di2015NewLine            //r-bit number) Di2015NewLine\int[] count=new int[1<<r]; Di2015NewLine\int[] pref=new int[1<<r]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// number of groups Di2015NewLine\int groups=(int)Math.Ceiling((double)b/(double)r); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// the mask to identify groups Di2015NewLine\int mask = (1<<r)-1; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// the algorithm: Di2015NewLine\for (int c=0, shift=0; c<groups; c++, shift+=r)Di2015NewLine\{ Di2015NewLine\\// reset count array Di2015NewLine\\for (int j=0; j<count.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine\\\count[j]=0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\// counting elements of the c-th group Di2015NewLine\\for (int i=0; i<a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine\\\count[(a[i]>>shift)&mask]++; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\// calculating prefixes Di2015NewLine\\pref[0]=0; Di2015NewLine\\for (int i=1; i<count.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine\\\pref[i]=pref[i-1]+count[i-1]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\// from a[] to t[] elements ordered by c-th group Di2015NewLine\\for (int i=0; i<a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine\\\t[pref[(a[i]>>shift)&mask]++]=a[i]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\// a[]=t[] and start again until the last group Di2015NewLine\\t.CopyTo(a,0); Di2015NewLine\} Di2015NewLine\// a is sorted Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1327755Di2015UniqueSeparator        var grp = doc.Root.Elements("Group")Di2015NewLine            .Where(g  => g.Elements("Reference").Any())Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine

1332929Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Configuration;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Win32;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.VisualBasic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Kiosk1 : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region "IDisposable"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Implementing IDisposable since it might be possible forDi2015NewLine    // someone to forget to cause the unhook to occur. happen.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int m_taskManagerValue=0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Free other state (managed objects).Di2015NewLine        if (m_hookHandle != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UnhookWindowsHookEx(m_hookHandle);Di2015NewLine            m_hookHandle = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (m_taskManagerValue > -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Enable();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private delegate int LowLevelHookDelegate(int code, int wParam, ref KeyboardLowLevelHookStruct lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int Hc_Action = 0;Di2015NewLine    private const int WindowsHookKeyboardLowLevel = 13;Di2015NewLine    private const int LowLevelKeyboardHfAltDown = 0x20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private enum WindowsMessageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        KeyDown = 0x100,Di2015NewLine        KeyUp = 0x101,Di2015NewLine        SystemKeyDown = 0x104,Di2015NewLine        SystemKeyUp = 0x105Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private enum VkDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Tab = 0x9,Di2015NewLine        Escape = 0x1b,Di2015NewLine        Shift = 0x10,Di2015NewLine        Control = 0x11,Di2015NewLine        Menu = 0x12,Di2015NewLine        // ALT key.Di2015NewLine        Alt = 0x12,Di2015NewLine        Pause = 0x13,Di2015NewLine        LeftWindows = 0x5b,Di2015NewLine        // Left Windows key (Microsoft Natural keyboard).Di2015NewLine        RightWindows = 0x5c,Di2015NewLine        // Right Windows key (Natural keyboard).Di2015NewLine        Applications = 0x5dDi2015NewLine        // Applications key (Natural keyboard).Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    private struct KeyboardLowLevelHookStructDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int VirtualKeyCode;Di2015NewLine        public int ScanCode;Di2015NewLine        public int Flags;Di2015NewLine        public int Time;Di2015NewLine        public UInt32 ExtraInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32", EntryPoint = "SetWindowsHookExA", CharSet = CharSet.Ansi, SetLastError = true, ExactSpelling = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int SetWindowsHookEx(int hook, LowLevelHookDelegate address, int mod, int threadId);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32", CharSet = CharSet.Ansi, SetLastError = true, ExactSpelling = true)]Di2015NewLine true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int GetAsyncKeyState(int virtualKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int m_hookHandle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int LowLevelHook(int code, int wParam, ref KeyboardLowLevelHookStruct lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (code == Hc_Action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((wParam == (int)WindowsMessage.KeyDown) || (wParam == (int)WindowsMessage.SystemKeyDown) || (wParam == (int)WindowsMessage.KeyUp) || (wParam == (int)WindowsMessage.SystemKeyUp))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Dim alt As Boolean = (GetAsyncKeyState(Vk.Alt) And &H8000) = &H8000Di2015NewLine                //Dim shift As Boolean = (GetAsyncKeyState(Vk.Shift) And &H8000) = &H8000Di2015NewLine                bool control = (GetAsyncKeyState((int)Vk.Control) & 0x8000) == 0x8000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool suppress = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // CTRL+ESCDi2015NewLine                if (control && lParam.VirtualKeyCode == (int)Vk.Escape)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    suppress = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // ALT+TABDi2015NewLine                if ((lParam.Flags & LowLevelKeyboardHfAltDown) == LowLevelKeyboardHfAltDown && lParam.VirtualKeyCode == (int)Vk.Tab)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    suppress = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // ALT+ESCDi2015NewLine                if ((lParam.Flags & LowLevelKeyboardHfAltDown) == LowLevelKeyboardHfAltDown && lParam.VirtualKeyCode == (int)Vk.Escape)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    suppress = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Left Windows button.Di2015NewLine                if (lParam.VirtualKeyCode == (int)Vk.LeftWindows)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    suppress = true;Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show("Pressed Left windows key");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Right Windows button.Di2015NewLine                if (lParam.VirtualKeyCode == (int)Vk.RightWindows)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    suppress = true;Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show("Pressed Right windows key");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Applications button.Di2015NewLine                if (lParam.VirtualKeyCode == (int)Vk.Applications)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    suppress = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (suppress)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return CallNextHookEx(m_hookHandle, code, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Disable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m_hookHandle == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_hookHandle = SetWindowsHookEx(WindowsHookKeyboardLowLevel, new LowLevelHookDelegate(this.LowLevelHook), Marshal.GetHINSTANCE(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetModules()[0]).ToInt32(), 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Enable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m_hookHandle != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UnhookWindowsHookEx(m_hookHandle);Di2015NewLine            m_hookHandle = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1333874Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace TypeSafeBindingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class BindingHelperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static string GetMemberName(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (expression.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                    var memberExpression = (MemberExpression) expression;Di2015NewLine                    var supername = GetMemberName(memberExpression.Expression);Di2015NewLine                    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(supername)) return memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine                    return String.Concat(supername, '.', memberExpression.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.Call:Di2015NewLine                    var callExpression = (MethodCallExpression) expression;Di2015NewLine                    return callExpression.Method.Name;Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.Convert:Di2015NewLine                    var unaryExpression = (UnaryExpression) expression;Di2015NewLine                    return GetMemberName(unaryExpression.Operand);Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.Parameter:Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.Constant: //ChangeDi2015NewLine                    return String.Empty;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("The expression is not a member access or method call expression");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Name<T, T2>(Expression<Func<T, T2>> expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetMemberName(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //NEWDi2015NewLine        public static string Name<T>(Expression<Func<T>> expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           return GetMemberName(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Bind<TC, TD, TP>(this TC control, Expression<Func<TC, TP>> controlProperty, TD dataSource, Expression<Func<TD, TP>> dataMember) where TC : ControlDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            control.DataBindings.Add(Name(controlProperty), dataSource, Name(dataMember));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void BindLabelText<T>(this Label control, T dataObject, Expression<Func<T, object>> dataMember)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // as this is way one any type of property is okDi2015NewLine            control.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataObject, Name(dataMember));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void BindEnabled<T>(this Control control, T dataObject, Expression<Func<T, bool>> dataMember)Di2015NewLine        {       Di2015NewLine           control.Bind(c => c.Enabled, dataObject, dataMember);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine 1334856Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Action<float> updateProgMethod;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        updateProgMethod = UpdateProgress;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetDirectorySizeAsync(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        backgroundWorker.RunWorkerAsync(path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void backgroundWorker_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DirectoryInfo di = new DirectoryInfo((string)e.Argument);Di2015NewLine        di.GetTotalSize(ProgressCallback);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Takes callbacks from the GetTotalSize() methodDi2015NewLine    private void ProgressCallback(float p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Invokes update progress bar on GUI thread:Di2015NewLine        this.BeginInvoke(updateProgMethod, new object[] { p });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Actually updates the progress bar:Di2015NewLine    private void UpdateProgress(float p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        progressBar.Value = (int)(p * (progressBar.Maximum - progressBar.Minimum)) + progressBar.Minimum;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class IOExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static long GetTotalSize(this DirectoryInfo directory, Action<float> progressCallback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileInfo[] files = directory.GetFiles("*.*", SearchOption.AllDirectories);Di2015NewLine        long sum = 0;Di2015NewLine        int countDown = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sum += files[i].Length;Di2015NewLine            countDown--;Di2015NewLine            if (progressCallback != null && countDown <= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                countDown = 100;Di2015NewLine                progressCallback((float)i / files.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sum;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1336582Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ReadWriteDictionary<K,V>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<K,V> dict = new Dictionary<K,V>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly ReaderWriterLockSlim rwLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public V Get(K key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReadLock(() => dict[key]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Set(K key, V value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WriteLock(() => dict.Add(key, value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<K, V>> GetPairs()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReadLock(() => dict.ToList());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private V2 ReadLock<V2>(Func<V2> func)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        rwLock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return func();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rwLock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteLock(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        rwLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rwLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCache["somekey"] = new ReadWriteDictionary<string,int>();Di2015NewLine

1339266Di2015UniqueSeparator// TC message queue manager, sends messagesDi2015NewLinepublic class TaskMessageQueueManagerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public void NotifySubscribersOfNewTasks()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var queue = getQueue(".\\private$\\TaskNotifications");Di2015NewLine    queue.Send("Tasks waiting.");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private MessageQueue getQueue(string name)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    MessageQueue queue = null;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (!MessageQueue.Exists(name))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        queue = MessageQueue.Create(name);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        queue = new MessageQueue(name);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new InvalidOperationException("An error occurred while retrieving the message queue '" + name + "'.", ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return queue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// TP message queue handler, receives messagesDi2015NewLinepublic class TaskMessageQueueHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private Thread m_thread;Di2015NewLine  private ManualResetEvent m_signal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Start()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    m_signal = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    m_thread = new Thread(MSMQReceiveLoop);Di2015NewLine    m_thread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Stop()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    m_signal.Set();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void MSMQReceiveLoop()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    bool running = true;Di2015NewLine    MessageQueue queue = getQueue(".\\private$\\TaskNotifications");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (running)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        var message = queue.Receive(); // Blocks here until a message is received by MSMQDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (message.Body.ToString() == "Tasks waiting.")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // TODO: Fire off process, perhaps another thread, to handle waiting tasksDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m_signal.WaitOne(10)) // Non-blocking check for exit signalDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          running = false; // If Stop method has been called, the signal will be set and we can end loopDi2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catchDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // handle errorDi2015NewLine         running = false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1340270Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IDataReader GetDataReader(string connectionStringKey, string storedProcedure, Dictionary<string, object> parameters) {Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand command = GetCommandWithConnection(connectionStringKey);Di2015NewLine        command.CommandText = storedProcedure;Di2015NewLine        command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var parameter in parameters ?? new Dictionary<string, object>())Di2015NewLine            command.Parameters.AddWithValue(parameter.Key, parameter.Value);Di2015NewLine        command.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLine        return command.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine        Log.Error(string.Format("Error in GetDataReader, executing sp: {0}", storedProcedure), e);Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }     Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static SqlCommand GetCommandWithConnection(string connectionStringKey) {Di2015NewLine    return new SqlConnection(GetConnectionString(connectionStringKey)).CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static string GetConnectionString(string connectionStringKey) {Di2015NewLine    return ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings[connectionStringKey].ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1340270Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetScalar<T>(string connectionStringKey, string storedProcedure, Parameters parameters) {Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        List<Parameter> outs = null;Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand command = GetCommandWithConnection(connectionStringKey);Di2015NewLine        command.CommandText = storedProcedure;Di2015NewLine        command.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLine        if (parameters != null) {Di2015NewLine            outs = parameters.FindAll(p => p.Direction != ParameterDirection.Input);Di2015NewLine            parameters.ForEach(p => command.Parameters.AddWithValue(p.Key, p.Value).Direction = p.Direction);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        command.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLine        object o = command.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine        T result = (o != null) ? (T)o : default(T);Di2015NewLine        if (outs != null && outs.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Parameter parameter in outs) {Di2015NewLine                SqlParameter sqlParameter = command.Parameters[parameter.Key];Di2015NewLine                parameters[parameter.Key] = (sqlParameter.Value == DBNull.Value) ? null : sqlParameter.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        command.Connection.Close();Di2015NewLine        if (o == null && (typeof(T) == typeof(int)) && parameters != null && parameters.ContainsKey("RowCount"))Di2015NewLine            result = (T)parameters["RowCount"];Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine        Log.Error(String.Format("Error in GetScalar<{0}>, executing sp: {1}", typeof(T).Name, storedProcedure), e);Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1340270Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Parameter{Di2015NewLine    public string Key { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public object Value { get; protected internal set; }Di2015NewLine    public ParameterDirection Direction { get; protected internal set; }Di2015NewLine    public Parameter(string key, object value) : this(key, value, ParameterDirection.Input) { }Di2015NewLine    public Parameter(string key, object value, ParameterDirection direction){Di2015NewLine        Key = key;Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine        Direction = direction;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class Parameters : List<Parameter>{Di2015NewLine    public Parameters() { }Di2015NewLine    public Parameters(object o){Di2015NewLine        Populate(o);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Add(string key, object value){Di2015NewLine        if (ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Parameter with the specified key already exists.");Di2015NewLine        Add(new Parameter(key, value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Add(string key, object value, ParameterDirection direction){Di2015NewLine        if (ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Parameter with the specified key already exists.");Di2015NewLine        Add(new Parameter(key, value, direction));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool ContainsKey(string key){Di2015NewLine        return (Find(p => p.Key == key) != null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected internal int GetIndex(string key){Di2015NewLine        int? index = null;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < Count; i++){Di2015NewLine            if (this[i].Key == key){Di2015NewLine                index = i;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (index == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new IndexOutOfRangeException("Parameter with the specified key does not exist.");Di2015NewLine        return (int)index;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public object this[string key]{Di2015NewLine        get { return this[GetIndex(key)].Value; }Di2015NewLine        set { this[GetIndex(key)].Value = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void Populate<T>(T obj){Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> pair in new ObjectProperties(obj, BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine            Add(pair.Key, pair.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1347630Di2015UniqueSeparator//Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// See the ReadMe.html for additional informationDi2015NewLinepublic class ObjectDumper {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Write(object element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write(element, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Write(object element, int depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write(element, depth, Console.Out);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Write(object element, int depth, TextWriter log)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ObjectDumper dumper = new ObjectDumper(depth);Di2015NewLine        dumper.writer = log;Di2015NewLine        dumper.WriteObject(null, element);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TextWriter writer;Di2015NewLine    int pos;Di2015NewLine    int level;Di2015NewLine    int depth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ObjectDumper(int depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.depth = depth;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Write(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s != null) {Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(s);Di2015NewLine            pos += s.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteIndent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < level; i++) writer.Write("  ");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        pos = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteTab()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write("  ");Di2015NewLine        while (pos % 8 != 0) Write(" ");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteObject(string prefix, object element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (element == null || element is ValueType || element is string) {Di2015NewLine            WriteIndent();Di2015NewLine            Write(prefix);Di2015NewLine            WriteValue(element);Di2015NewLine            WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable enumerableElement = element as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLine            if (enumerableElement != null) {Di2015NewLine                foreach (object item in enumerableElement) {Di2015NewLine                    if (item is IEnumerable && !(item is string)) {Di2015NewLine                        WriteIndent();Di2015NewLine                        Write(prefix);Di2015NewLine                        Write("...");Di2015NewLine                        WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                        if (level < depth) {Di2015NewLine                            level++;Di2015NewLine                            WriteObject(prefix, item);Di2015NewLine                            level--;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else {Di2015NewLine                        WriteObject(prefix, item);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                MemberInfo[] members = element.GetType().GetMembers(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine                WriteIndent();Di2015NewLine                Write(prefix);Di2015NewLine                bool propWritten = false;Di2015NewLine                foreach (MemberInfo m in members) {Di2015NewLine                    FieldInfo f = m as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine                    PropertyInfo p = m as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine                    if (f != null || p != null) {Di2015NewLine                        if (propWritten) {Di2015NewLine                            WriteTab();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else {Di2015NewLine                            propWritten = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        Write(m.Name);Di2015NewLine                        Write("=");Di2015NewLine                        Type t = f != null ? f.FieldType : p.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine                        if (t.IsValueType || t == typeof(string)) {Di2015NewLine                            WriteValue(f != null ? f.GetValue(element) : p.GetValue(element, null));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else {Di2015NewLine                            if (typeof(IEnumerable).IsAssignableFrom(t)) {Di2015NewLine                                Write("...");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            else {Di2015NewLine                                Write("{ }");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (propWritten) WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                if (level < depth) {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (MemberInfo m in members) {Di2015NewLine                        FieldInfo f = m as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine                        PropertyInfo p = m as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine                        if (f != null || p != null) {Di2015NewLine                            Type t = f != null ? f.FieldType : p.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine                            if (!(t.IsValueType || t == typeof(string))) {Di2015NewLine                                object value = f != null ? f.GetValue(element) : p.GetValue(element, null);Di2015NewLine                                if (value != null) {Di2015NewLine                                    level++;Di2015NewLine                                    WriteObject(m.Name + ": ", value);Di2015NewLine                                    level--;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteValue(object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (o == null) {Di2015NewLine            Write("null");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (o is DateTime) {Di2015NewLine            Write(((DateTime)o).ToShortDateString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (o is ValueType || o is string) {Di2015NewLine            Write(o.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (o is IEnumerable) {Di2015NewLine            Write("...");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            Write("{ }");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1349892Di2015UniqueSeparator Public Shared Function CleanHtml(ByVal html As String) As StringDi2015NewLine     '' Cleans all manner of evils from the rich text editors in IE, Firefox, Word, and ExcelDi2015NewLine     '' Only returns acceptable HTML, and converts line breaks to <br />Di2015NewLine     '' Acceptable HTML includes HTML-encoded entities.Di2015NewLine     html = html.Replace("&" & "nbsp;", " ").Trim() ' concat here due to SO formattingDi2015NewLine     '' Does this have HTML tags?Di2015NewLine     If html.IndexOf("<") >= 0 ThenDi2015NewLine         '' Make all tags lowercaseDi2015NewLine         html = RegEx.Replace(html, "<[^>]+>", AddressOf LowerTag)Di2015NewLine         '' Filter out anything except allowed tagsDi2015NewLine         '' Problem: this strips attributes, including href from aDi2015NewLine         '' http://stackoverflow.com/questions/307013/how-do-i-filter-all-html-tags-except-a-certain-whitelistDi2015NewLine         Dim AcceptableTags      As String   = "i|b|u|sup|sub|ol|ul|li|br|h2|h3|h4|h5|span|div|p|a|img|blockquote"Di2015NewLine         Dim WhiteListPattern    As String   = "</?(?(?=" & AcceptableTags & ")notag|[a-zA-Z0-9]+)(?:\\s[a-zA-Z0-9\\-]+=?(?:([""']?).*?\\1?)?)*\\s*/?>"Di2015NewLine         html = Regex.Replace(html, WhiteListPattern, "", RegExOptions.Compiled)Di2015NewLine         '' Make all BR/br tags look the same, and trim them of whitespace before/afterDi2015NewLine         html = RegEx.Replace(html, "\\s*<br[^>]*>\\s*", "<br />", RegExOptions.Compiled)Di2015NewLine     End IfDi2015NewLine     '' No CRsDi2015NewLine     html = html.Replace(controlChars.CR, "")Di2015NewLine     '' Convert remaining LFs to line breaksDi2015NewLine     html = html.Replace(controlChars.LF, "<br />")Di2015NewLine     '' Trim BRs at the end of any string, and spaces on either sideDi2015NewLine     Return RegEx.Replace(html, "(<br />)+$", "", RegExOptions.Compiled).Trim()Di2015NewLine End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine Public Shared Function LowerTag(m As Match) As StringDi2015NewLine   Return m.ToString().ToLower()Di2015NewLine End FunctionDi2015NewLine

1352556Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Produce an XPath literal equal to the value if possible; if not, produceDi2015NewLine/// an XPath expression that will match the value.Di2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// Note that this function will produce very long XPath expressions if a valueDi2015NewLine/// contains a long run of double quotes.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="value">The value to match.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>If the value contains only single or double quotes, an XPathDi2015NewLine/// literal equal to the value.  If it contains both, an XPath expression,Di2015NewLine/// using concat(), that evaluates to the value.</returns>Di2015NewLinestatic string XPathLiteral(string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if the value contains only single or double quotes, constructDi2015NewLine    // an XPath literalDi2015NewLine    if (!value.Contains("\\""))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "\\"" + value + "\\"";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!value.Contains("'"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "'" + value + "'";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if the value contains both single and double quotes, construct anDi2015NewLine    // expression that concatenates all non-double-quote substrings withDi2015NewLine    // the quotes, e.g.:Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    //    concat("foo", '"', "bar")Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("concat(");Di2015NewLine    string[] substrings = value.Split('\\"');Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < substrings.Length; i++ )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool needComma = (i>0);Di2015NewLine        if (substrings[i] != "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(", ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(substrings[i]);Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLine            needComma = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (i < substrings.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (needComma)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(", ");                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("'\\"'");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(")");Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1352556Di2015UniqueSeparator    foreach (string s in new[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        "foo",              // no quotesDi2015NewLine        "\\"foo",            // double quotes onlyDi2015NewLine        "'foo",             // single quotes onlyDi2015NewLine        "'foo\\"bar",        // both; double quotes in mid-stringDi2015NewLine        "'foo\\"bar\\"baz",   // multiple double quotes in mid-stringDi2015NewLine        "'foo\\"",           // string ends with double quotesDi2015NewLine        "'foo\\"\\"",         // string ends with run of double quotesDi2015NewLine        "\\"'foo",           // string begins with double quotesDi2015NewLine        "\\"\\"'foo",         // string begins with run of double quotesDi2015NewLine        "'foo\\"\\"bar"       // run of double quotes in mid-stringDi2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(s);Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(" = ");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(XPathLiteral(s));Di2015NewLine        XmlElement elm = d.CreateElement("test");Di2015NewLine        d.DocumentElement.AppendChild(elm);Di2015NewLine        elm.SetAttribute("value", s);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string xpath = "/root/test[@value = " + XPathLiteral(s) + "]";Di2015NewLine        if (d.SelectSingleNode(xpath) == elm)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("OK");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Should have found a match for {0}, and didn't.", s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
