1359717Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] input = { "4:19 PM         5:15 PM  this is some text blah blah",Di2015NewLine    \           "3:00 PM         5:00 PM  text"Di2015NewLine    \\\ };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// build up patternDi2015NewLinestring datePattern = @"(\\d+:\\d+\\s(?:AM|PM))";Di2015NewLinestring pattern = String.Format("^{0}{1}{2}{3}$",Di2015NewLine                               datePattern, @"\\s+", datePattern, @"\\s+.*");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTimeSpan total = new TimeSpan();Di2015NewLineforeach (string text in input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var match = Regex.Match(text, pattern);Di2015NewLine    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \// skip first group which has entire matchDi2015NewLine    \DateTime dt1 = DateTime.Parse(match.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine    \DateTime dt2 = DateTime.Parse(match.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLine    \TimeSpan diff = dt2 - dt1;Di2015NewLine    \total += diff;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Total difference: {0}", total);Di2015NewLine

     yield return desc;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Apple GetDefaultApple(FruitDescription desc)Di2015NewLine );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Number of fruit: {0}",Di2015NewLine            result.Count);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Number of apples: {0}",Di2015NewLine 1361369Di2015UniqueSeparatorFlowLayoutPanel
1361369Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate enum DirectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Next,Di2015NewLine    PreviousDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void SwapLocations(Control current, Direction direction)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (current == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("current");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // get the parentDi2015NewLine    Control parent = current.Parent;Di2015NewLine    // forward or backward?Di2015NewLine    bool forward = direction == Direction.Next;Di2015NewLine    // get the next control in the given directionDi2015NewLine    Control next = parent.GetNextControl(current, forward);Di2015NewLine    if (next == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // we get here, at the "end" in the given direction; we want toDi2015NewLine        // go to the other "end"Di2015NewLine        next = current;Di2015NewLine        while (parent.GetNextControl(next, !forward) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            next = parent.GetNextControl(next, !forward);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // get the indices for the current and next controlsDi2015NewLine    int nextIndex = parent.Controls.IndexOf(next);Di2015NewLine    int currentIndex = parent.Controls.IndexOf(current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // swap the indicesDi2015NewLine    parent.Controls.SetChildIndex(current, nextIndex);Di2015NewLine    parent.Controls.SetChildIndex(next, currentIndex);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1361369Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Button_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SwapLocations(sender as Control, Direction.Next);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1362005Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Assembly BuildAssembly(string code)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider provider = new CSharpCodeProvider();Di2015NewLine    ICodeCompiler compiler = provider.CreateCompiler();Di2015NewLine    CompilerParameters compilerparams = new CompilerParameters();Di2015NewLine    compilerparams.GenerateExecutable = false;Di2015NewLine    compilerparams.GenerateInMemory = true;Di2015NewLine    CompilerResults results = compiler.CompileAssemblyFromSource(compilerparams, code);Di2015NewLine    if (results.Errors.HasErrors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       StringBuilder errors = new StringBuilder("Compiler Errors :\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine       foreach (CompilerError error in results.Errors )Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine            errors.AppendFormat("Line {0},{1}\\t: {2}\\n", error.Line, error.Column, error.ErrorText);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       throw new Exception(errors.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return results.CompiledAssembly;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic object ExecuteCode(string code, string namespacename, string classname, string functionname, bool isstatic, params object[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object returnval = null;Di2015NewLine    Assembly asm = BuildAssembly(code);Di2015NewLine    object instance = null;Di2015NewLine    Type type = null;Di2015NewLine    if (isstatic)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        type = asm.GetType(namespacename + "." + classname);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        instance = asm.CreateInstance(namespacename + "." + classname);Di2015NewLine        type = instance.GetType();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo method = type.GetMethod(functionname);Di2015NewLine    returnval = method.Invoke(instance, args);Di2015NewLine    return returnval;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

( _instance == null ) {Di2015NewLine            _fadeTime = fadeTimeInMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine            _instance = new SplashForm();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Hide the form initially to avoid any pre-paint flicker.Di2015NewLine            _instance.Opacity = 0;Di2015NewLine            ( ( Form ) _instance ).Show();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Process the be used toDi2015NewLine                // provide a smooth fading effect.Di2015NewLine                int fadeStep = ( int ) Math.Round( ( double ) _fadeTime / 20 );Di2015NewLine                _instance.fadeTimer.Interval = fadeStep;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Perform the fade in.Di2015NewLine                for ( int ii = 0; ii <= _fadeTime; ii += fadeStep ) {Di2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep( fadeStep );Di2015NewLine                    _instance.Opacity += 0.05;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                // 1369887Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetDescription(this System.Enum value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string enumID = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    string enumDesc = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {         Di2015NewLine        // try to lookup Description attributeDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo field = value.GetType().GetField(value.ToString());Di2015NewLine        object[] attribs = field.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine        if (attribs.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            enumID = ((DescriptionAttribute)attribs[0]).Description;Di2015NewLine            enumDesc = TranslationHelper.GetTranslation(enumID);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(enumID) || TranslationHelper.IsTranslationMissing(enumDesc))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // try to lookup translation from EnumName_EnumValueDi2015NewLine            string[] enumName = value.GetType().ToString().Split('.');Di2015NewLine            enumID = string.Format("{0}_{1}", enumName[enumName.Length - 1], value.ToString());Di2015NewLine            enumDesc = TranslationHelper.GetTranslation(enumID);Di2015NewLine            if (TranslationHelper.IsTranslationMissing(enumDesc))Di2015NewLine                enumDesc = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // try to format CamelCase to proper namesDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(enumDesc))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Regex capitalLetterMatch = new Regex("\\\\B[A-Z]", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine            enumDesc = capitalLetterMatch.Replace(value.ToString(), " $&");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if any error, fallback to string valueDi2015NewLine        enumDesc = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return enumDesc;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1369887Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LocalizableEnumDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Column names exposed by LocalizableEnumDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class ColumnNamesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public const string ID = "EnumValue";Di2015NewLine        public const string EntityValue = "EnumDescription";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LocalizableEnum<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T m_ItemVal;Di2015NewLine    private string m_ItemDesc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LocalizableEnum(T id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Enum idEnum = id as System.Enum;Di2015NewLine        if (idEnum == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("Type {0} is not enum", id.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_ItemVal = id;Di2015NewLine            m_ItemDesc = idEnum.GetDescription();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return m_ItemDesc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T EnumValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_ID; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string EnumDescriptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return ToString(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1369887Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<LocalizableEnum<T>> GetEnumList<T>(object excludeMember)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<LocalizableEnum<T>> list =null;Di2015NewLine    Array listVal = System.Enum.GetValues(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    if (listVal.Length>0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string excludedValStr = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        if (excludeMember != null)Di2015NewLine            excludedValStr = ((T)excludeMember).ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        list = new List<LocalizableEnum<T>>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < listVal.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T currentVal = (T)listVal.GetValue(i);Di2015NewLine            if (excludedValStr != currentVal.ToString())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Enum enumVal = currentVal as System.Enum;Di2015NewLine                LocalizableEnum<T> enumMember = new LocalizableEnum<T>(currentVal);Di2015NewLine                list.Add(enumMember);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1370891Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T Execute<T>(Func<T> func, int timeout)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T result;Di2015NewLine    TryExecute(func, timeout, out result);Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool TryExecute<T>(Func<T> func, int timeout, out T result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t = default(T);Di2015NewLine    var thread = new Thread(() => t = func());Di2015NewLine    thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    var completed = thread.Join(timeout);Di2015NewLine    if (!completed) thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine    result = t;Di2015NewLine    return completed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1371378Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object str = "Hello World";Di2015NewLine        object num = 5;Di2015NewLine        object obj = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("var\\tvalue\\t\\tFoo() Type\\tCallFoo() Type");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("-------------------------------------------------------");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}\\t{1}\\t{2}\\t{3}", "str", str, MyClass.Foo(str), MyClass.CallFoo(str));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}\\t{1}\\t\\t{2}\\t{3}", "num", num, MyClass.Foo(num), MyClass.CallFoo(num));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}\\t{1}\\t{2}\\t{3}", "obj", obj, MyClass.Foo(obj), MyClass.CallFoo(obj));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Type Foo<T>(T param)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type CallFoo(object param)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (Type)typeof(MyClass).GetMethod("Foo").MakeGenericMethod(new[] { param.GetType() }).Invoke(null, new[] { param });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1372721Di2015UniqueSeparatorset(s for s in sets if not any(other < s for other in sets))Di2015NewLine
1372721Di2015UniqueSeparatorfrom collections import defaultdictDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef find_minimal_phrases(phrases):Di2015NewLine    # Make the phrases hashableDi2015NewLine    phrases = map(frozenset, phrases)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # Create a map to find all phrases containing a wordDi2015NewLine    phrases_containing = defaultdict(set)Di2015NewLine    for phrase in phrases:Di2015NewLine        for word in phrase:Di2015NewLine            phrases_containing[word].add(phrase)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    minimal_phrases = []Di2015NewLine    found_superphrases = set()Di2015NewLine    # in sorted by length order to find minimal sets first thanks to theDi2015NewLine    # fact that a.superset(b) implies len(a) > len(b)Di2015NewLine    for phrase in sorted(phrases, key=len):Di2015NewLine        if phrase not in found_superphrases:Di2015NewLine            connected_phrases = [phrases_containing[word] for word in phrase]Di2015NewLine            connected_phrases.sort(key=len)Di2015NewLine            superphrases = reduce(set.intersection, connected_phrases)Di2015NewLine            found_superphrases.update(superphrases)Di2015NewLine            minimal_phrases.append(phrase)Di2015NewLine    return minimal_phrasesDi2015NewLine

1381204Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var x = Foo().OrderBy(t => t.FullName).Select(t => t.FullName);Di2015NewLine            var y = Bar().OrderBy(t => t.FullName).Select(t => t.FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            File.WriteAllLines("a.txt", x.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            File.WriteAllLines("b.txt", y.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<Assembly> Foo()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Type> toInstantiate = AppDomain.CurrentDomainDi2015NewLine                .GetAssemblies().SelectMany(assembly => assembly.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine                .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return toInstantiate.Select(t => t.Assembly).Distinct().ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<Assembly> Bar()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Type> toInstantiate = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine            List<Type> allTypes = AppDomain.CurrentDomainDi2015NewLine                .GetAssemblies().SelectMany(assembly => assembly.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine                .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Type t in allTypes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                toInstantiate.Add(t);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return toInstantiate.Select(t => t.Assembly).Distinct().ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1381994Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal interface IOptionalDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  T? Get<T>(string id) where T : struct;Di2015NewLine  T GetRef<T>(string id) where T : class;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  IOptional Set<T>(string id, T value);Di2015NewLine  IOptional Clear(string id);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal sealed class OptionalNone : IOptionalDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static readonly OptionalNone Default = new OptionalNone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T? Get<T>(string id)  where T : structDi2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T GetRef<T>(string id)  where T : classDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Set<T>(string id, T value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (value == null)Di2015NewLine      return Clear(id);Di2015NewLine    return new OptionalWithOne<T>(id, value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Clear(string id)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return this; // no effectDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1381994Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class OptionalWithOne<X> : IOptionalDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private string id1;Di2015NewLine  private X value1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public OptionalWithOne(string id, X value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.id1 = id;Di2015NewLine    this.value1 = value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T? Get<T>(string id)  where T : structDi2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine      return (T)(object)this.value1;Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T GetRef<T>(string id)  where T : class        Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine      return (T)(object)this.value1;Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Set<T>(string id, T value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        return OptionalNone.Default;Di2015NewLine      this.value1 = (X)(object)value;Di2015NewLine      return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine      return new OptionalWithTwo<X,T>(this.id1, this.value1, id, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Clear(string id)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine      return OptionalNone.Default;Di2015NewLine    return this; // no effectDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1381994Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class OptionalWithTwo<X,Y> : IOptionalDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private string id1;Di2015NewLine  private X value1;Di2015NewLine  private string id2;Di2015NewLine  private Y value2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public OptionalWithTwo(Di2015NewLine    string id1, X value1,Di2015NewLine    string id2, Y value2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.id1 = id1;Di2015NewLine    this.value1 = value1;Di2015NewLine    this.id2 = id2;Di2015NewLine    this.value2 = value2;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T? Get<T>(string id)  where T : structDi2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine      return (T)(object)this.value1;Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id2))Di2015NewLine      return (T)(object)this.value2;Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T GetRef<T>(string id)  where T : class        Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine      return (T)(object)this.value1;Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id2))Di2015NewLine      return (T)(object)this.value2;Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Set<T>(string id, T value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        return Clear(id);Di2015NewLine      this.value1 = (X)(object)value;Di2015NewLine      return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (string.Equals(id, this.id2))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        return Clear(id);Di2015NewLine      this.value2 = (Y)(object)value;Di2015NewLine      return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine      return new OptionalWithMany(Di2015NewLine        this.id1, this.value1,Di2015NewLine        this.id2, this.value2,Di2015NewLine        id, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Clear(string id)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id1))Di2015NewLine      return new OptionalWithOne<Y>(this.id2, this.value2);Di2015NewLine    if (string.Equals(id, this.id2))Di2015NewLine      return new OptionalWithOne<X>(this.id1, this.value1);Di2015NewLine    return this; // no effectDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1381994Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class OptionalWithMany : IOptionalDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private List<string> ids = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine  // this boxes, if you had a restricted set of data types Di2015NewLine  // you could do a per type list and map between themDi2015NewLine  // it is assumed that this is sufficiently uncommon that you don't careDi2015NewLine  private List<object> values = new List<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public OptionalWithMany(Di2015NewLine    string id1, object value1,Di2015NewLine    string id2, object value2,Di2015NewLine    string id3, object value3)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.ids.Add(id1);Di2015NewLine    this.values.Add(value1);Di2015NewLine    this.ids.Add(id2);Di2015NewLine    this.values.Add(value2);Di2015NewLine    this.ids.Add(id3);Di2015NewLine    this.values.Add(value3);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T? Get<T>(string id)  where T : structDi2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLine    for (int i= 0; i < this.values.Count;i++)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine      if (string.Equals(id, this.ids[i]))Di2015NewLine        return (T)this.values[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T GetRef<T>(string id)  where T : class        Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    for (int i= 0; i < this.values.Count;i++)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine      if (string.Equals(id, this.ids[i]))Di2015NewLine        return (T)this.values[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Set<T>(string id, T value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    for (int i= 0; i < this.values.Count;i++)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine      if (string.Equals(id, this.ids[i]))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine          return Clear(id);           Di2015NewLine        this.values[i] = value;Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (value != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      this.ids.Add(id);Di2015NewLine      this.values.Add(value);Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine    return this;  Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IOptional Clear(string id)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    for (int i= 0; i < this.values.Count;i++)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine      if (string.Equals(id, this.ids[i]))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        this.ids.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine        this.values.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine        return ShrinkIfNeeded();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return this; // no effectDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private IOptional ShrinkIfNeeded()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (this.ids.Count == 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //return new OptionalWithTwo<X,Y>(Di2015NewLine      // this.ids[0], this.values[0],Di2015NewLine      //  this.ids[1], this.values[1]);Di2015NewLine      return (IOptional)Di2015NewLine        typeof(OptionalWithTwo<,>).MakeGenericType(Di2015NewLine          // this is a bit risky. Di2015NewLine          // your value types may not use inhertenceDi2015NewLine          this.values[0].GetType(),Di2015NewLine          this.values[1].GetType())Di2015NewLine        .GetConstructors().First().Invoke(Di2015NewLine          new object[] Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            this.ids[0], this.values[0],Di2015NewLine            this.ids[1], this.values[1]Di2015NewLine          });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return this;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1382380Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SinBuddyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<double, double> _cachedSinsDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<double, double>();Di2015NewLine    private const double _cacheStep = 0.01;Di2015NewLine    private double _factor = Math.PI / 180.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SinBuddy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (double angleDegrees = 0; angleDegrees <= 360.0; Di2015NewLine            angleDegrees += _cacheStep)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double angleRadians = angleDegrees * _factor;Di2015NewLine            _cachedSins.Add(angleDegrees, Math.Sin(angleRadians));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double CacheStepDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _cacheStep;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double SinLookup(double angleDegrees)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double value;Di2015NewLine        if (_cachedSins.TryGetValue(angleDegrees, out value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                String.Format("No cached Sin value for {0} degrees",Di2015NewLine                angleDegrees));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double Sin(double angleDegrees)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double angleRadians = angleDegrees * _factor;Di2015NewLine        return Math.Sin(angleRadians);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1382380Di2015UniqueSeparatorSinBuddy buddy = new SinBuddy();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSystem.Diagnostics.Stopwatch timer = new System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineint loops = 200;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Math.SinDi2015NewLinetimer.Start();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < loops; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (double angleDegrees = 0; angleDegrees <= 360.0; Di2015NewLine        angleDegrees += buddy.CacheStep)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double d = buddy.Sin(angleDegrees);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinetimer.Stop();Di2015NewLineMessageBox.Show(timer.ElapsedMilliseconds.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// lookupDi2015NewLinetimer.Start();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < loops; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (double angleDegrees = 0; angleDegrees <= 360.0;Di2015NewLine        angleDegrees += buddy.CacheStep)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double d = buddy.SinLookup(angleDegrees);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinetimer.Stop();Di2015NewLineMessageBox.Show(timer.ElapsedMilliseconds.ToString());Di2015NewLine
1382380Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SinBuddyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<double, double> _cachedSinsDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<double, double>();Di2015NewLine    private const double _cacheStep = 0.01;Di2015NewLine    private double _factor = Math.PI / 180.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private double[] _arrayedSins;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SinBuddy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // set up dictionaryDi2015NewLine        for (double angleDegrees = 0; angleDegrees <= 360.0; Di2015NewLine            angleDegrees += _cacheStep)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double angleRadians = angleDegrees * _factor;Di2015NewLine            _cachedSins.Add(angleDegrees, Math.Sin(angleRadians));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // set up arrayDi2015NewLine        int elements = (int)(360.0 / _cacheStep) + 1;Di2015NewLine        _arrayedSins = new double[elements];Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (double angleDegrees = 0; angleDegrees <= 360.0;Di2015NewLine            angleDegrees += _cacheStep)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double angleRadians = angleDegrees * _factor;Di2015NewLine            //_cachedSins.Add(angleDegrees, Math.Sin(angleRadians));Di2015NewLine            _arrayedSins[i] = Math.Sin(angleRadians);Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double CacheStepDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _cacheStep;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double SinArrayed(double angleDegrees)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = (int)(angleDegrees / _cacheStep);Di2015NewLine        return _arrayedSins[index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double SinLookup(double angleDegrees)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double value;Di2015NewLine        if (_cachedSins.TryGetValue(angleDegrees, out value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                String.Format("No cached Sin value for {0} degrees",Di2015NewLine                angleDegrees));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double Sin(double angleDegrees)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double angleRadians = angleDegrees * _factor;Di2015NewLine        return Math.Sin(angleRadians);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <value>The maximum depth of redirects to parse.</value>Di2015NewLine    public int MaximumDepthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get; Di2015NewLine        private set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Resolves any redirects at the specified URI.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param {Di2015NewLine        List<Uri> redirectHistory = new List<Uri>();Di2015NewLine        return this.Resolve(destination, redirectHistory);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Resolves any redirects at the specified URI.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="destination">The initial URI.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// return this.Resolve(destination, this.MaximumDepth, redirectHistory);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Resolves any redirects at the specified URI.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="destination">The initial URI.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="hopsLeft">The maximum number of redirects left to follow.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="redirectHistory">A collection of <see cref="Uri"/> objects representing the redirect history.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The URI after resolving any HTTP redirects.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private Uri Resolve(Uri destination, int hopsLeft, ICollection<Uri> redirectHistory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(destination);Di2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "HEAD";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Uri resolvedUri;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Redirect || Di2015NewLine            response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Moved || Di2015NewLine            response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.MovedPermanently)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (hopsLeft > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Uri redirectUri = new Uri(response.GetResponseHeader("Location"));Di2015NewLine                if (redirectHistory.Contains(redirectUri))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Recursive redirection found");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                redirectHistory.Add(redirectUri);Di2015NewLine                resolvedUri = this.Resolve(redirectUri, hopsLeft - 1, redirectHistory);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Maximum redirect depth reached");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            resolvedUri = response.ResponseUri;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return resolvedUri;            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1385844Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonlyDictionary<Type, Func<object, byte[]>> Converters = Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<Type, Func<object, byte[]>>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    { typeof(string), o => Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes((string) o) },Di2015NewLine    { typeof(bool), o => BitConverter.GetBytes((bool) o) },Di2015NewLine    { typeof(char), o => BitConverter.GetBytes((char) o) },Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void ToBytes(object[] data, byte[] buffer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int offset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (object obj in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Or do whatever you wantDi2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Unable to convert null values");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Func<object, byte[]> converter;Di2015NewLine        if (!Converters.TryGetValue(obj.GetType(), out converter))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("No converter for " + obj.GetType());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] obytes = converter(obj);Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(obytes, 0, buffer, offset, obytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        offset += obytes.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1385844Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly Dictionary<Type, Func<object, byte[]>> Converters = Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<Type, Func<object, byte[]>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic WhateverYourTypeIsCalled()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    AddConverter<string>(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes);Di2015NewLine    AddConverter<bool>(BitConverter.GetBytes);Di2015NewLine    AddConverter<char>(BitConverter.GetBytes);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void AddConverter<T>(Func<T, byte[]> converter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Converters.Add(typeof(T), x => converter((T) x));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1386812Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct IPV4AddressDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private UInt32 _Value;Di2015NewLine  private UInt32 _Mask;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public UInt32 ValueDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    get { return _Value; }Di2015NewLine    private set { _Value = value; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public UInt32 MaskDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    get { return _Mask; }Di2015NewLine    private set { _Mask = value; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static IPV4Address FromString(string address)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return FromString(address, 32);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static IPV4Address FromString(string address, int maskLength)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string[] parts = address.Split('.');Di2015NewLine    UInt32 value = ((UInt32.Parse(parts[0]) << 24) +Di2015NewLine      ((UInt32.Parse(parts[1])) << 16) +Di2015NewLine      ((UInt32.Parse(parts[2])) << 8) +Di2015NewLine      UInt32.Parse(parts[3]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new IPV4Address(value, maskLength);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IPV4Address(UInt32 value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    _Value = value;Di2015NewLine    _Mask = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public IPV4Address(UInt32 value, int maskLength)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (maskLength < 0 || maskLength > 32)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("maskLength", "Must be 0 to 32");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _Value = value;Di2015NewLine    if (maskLength == 32)Di2015NewLine      _Mask = UInt32.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      _Mask = ~(UInt32)((1 << (32 - maskLength))-1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((_Value & _Mask) != _Value)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentException("Address value must be contained in mask");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public bool Contains(IPV4Address address)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if ((Mask & address.Mask) == Mask)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return (address.Value & Mask) == Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string result = String.Format("{0}.{1}.{2}.{3}", (_Value >> 24), Di2015NewLine      (_Value >> 16) & 0xFF, Di2015NewLine      (_Value >> 8) & 0xFF, Di2015NewLine      _Value & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (_Mask != UInt32.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine      result += "/" + String.Format("{0}.{1}.{2}.{3}", (_Mask >> 24),Di2015NewLine      (_Mask >> 16) & 0xFF,Di2015NewLine      (_Mask >> 8) & 0xFF,Di2015NewLine      _Mask & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1393506Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic TEntity GetCount<TEntity>(this DataContext ctx, int key) where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetCount<TEntity, int>(ctx, key);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic TEntity GetCount<TEntity, TKey>(this DataContext ctx, TKey key) where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var table = ctx.GetTable<TEntity>();Di2015NewLine    var pkProp = (from member in ctx.Mapping.GetMetaType(typeof(TEntity)).DataMembersDi2015NewLine                  where member.IsPrimaryKeyDi2015NewLine                  select member.Member).Single();Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntity), "x");Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression memberExp;Di2015NewLine    switch (pkProp.MemberType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case MemberTypes.Field: memberExp = Expression.Field(param, (FieldInfo)pkProp); break;Di2015NewLine        case MemberTypes.Property: memberExp = Expression.Property(param, (PropertyInfo)pkProp); break;Di2015NewLine        default: throw new NotSupportedException("Invalid primary key member: " + pkProp.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Expression body = Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine        memberExp, Expression.Constant(key, typeof(TKey)));Di2015NewLine    var predicate = Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, bool>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine    return table.Count(predicate);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1397060Di2015UniqueSeparator public const string OPEN_LIST_TAG = "<ul>";Di2015NewLine public const string CLOSE_LIST_TAG = "</ul>";Di2015NewLine public const string OPEN_LIST_ITEM_TAG = "<li>";Di2015NewLine public const string CLOSE_LIST_ITEM_TAG = "</li>";Di2015NewLine
1397060Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Adds another level of HTML list and list items to a stringDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="str">The string to add</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="liStrings">The list of strings at this level to add</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="iTabIndex">The current number of tabs indented from the left</param>Di2015NewLinepublic void GenerateHTML( System.Text.StringBuilder str, List<string> liStrings, int iTabIndex) {Di2015NewLine   //add tabs to start of stringDi2015NewLine   this.AddTabs(str, iTabIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //append opening list tagDi2015NewLine   str.AppendLine(OPEN_LIST_TAG);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   foreach (string strParent in liStrings) {Di2015NewLine      //add tabs for list itemDi2015NewLine      this.AddTabs(str, iTabIndex + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //if there are child strings for this string then loop through them recursivelyDi2015NewLine      if (this.GetChildStrings(strParent).Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine         str.AppendLine(OPEN_LIST_ITEM_TAG + strParent);Di2015NewLine         GenerateHTML(str, this.GetChildStrings(strParent), iTabIndex + 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //add tabs for closing list item tagDi2015NewLine         this.AddTabs(str, iTabIndex + 1);Di2015NewLine         str.AppendLine(CLOSE_LIST_ITEM_TAG);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      else {Di2015NewLine         //append opening and closing list item tagsDi2015NewLine         str.AppendLine(OPEN_LIST_ITEM_TAG + strParent + CLOSE_LIST_ITEM_TAG);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //add tabs for closing list tagDi2015NewLine   this.AddTabs(str, iTabIndex);Di2015NewLine   //append closing list tagDi2015NewLine   str.AppendLine(CLOSE_LIST_TAG);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1401193Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport javax.crypto.Cipher;Di2015NewLineimport javax.crypto.spec.IvParameterSpec;Di2015NewLineimport javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class EncryptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static byte[] sharedkey = {Di2015NewLine    0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x05, 0x07, 0x0B, 0x0D, 0x11, Di2015NewLine    0x12, 0x11, 0x0D, 0x0B, 0x07, 0x02, 0x04, 0x08, Di2015NewLine    0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x05, 0x07, 0x0B, 0x0D, 0x11Di2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static byte[] sharedvector = {Di2015NewLine    0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x05, 0x07, 0x0B, 0x0D, 0x11Di2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void main(String... argv)Di2015NewLine    throws ExceptionDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    String plaintext = "userNameHere:passwordHere";Di2015NewLine    String ciphertext = encrypt(plaintext);Di2015NewLine    System.out.println(ciphertext);Di2015NewLine    System.out.println(decrypt(ciphertext));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static String encrypt(String plaintext)Di2015NewLine    throws ExceptionDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Cipher c = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");Di2015NewLine    c.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, new SecretKeySpec(sharedkey, "DESede"), new IvParameterSpec(sharedvector));Di2015NewLine    byte[] encrypted = c.doFinal(plaintext.getBytes("UTF-8"));Di2015NewLine    return Base64.encode(encrypted);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static String decrypt(String ciphertext)Di2015NewLine    throws ExceptionDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Cipher c = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");Di2015NewLine    c.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, new SecretKeySpec(sharedkey, "DESede"), new IvParameterSpec(sharedvector));Di2015NewLine    byte[] decrypted = c.doFinal(Base64.decode(ciphertext));Di2015NewLine    return new String(decrypted, "UTF-8");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1403811Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SplitFile(string inputFile,Di2015NewLine                             string outputPrefix,Di2015NewLine                             int chunkSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[chunkSize];Di2015NewLine    using (Stream input = File.OpenRead(inputFile))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (input.Position < input.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Stream output = File.Create(outputPrefix + index))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int chunkBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (chunkBytesRead < chunkSize)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int bytesRead = input.Read(buffer, Di2015NewLine                                               chunkBytesRead, Di2015NewLine                                               chunkSize - chunkBytesRead);Di2015NewLine                    // End of inputDi2015NewLine                    if (bytesRead == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    chunkBytesRead += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                output.Write(buffer, 0, chunkBytesRead);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            index++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1405052Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(this IList<T> theList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable theTable = CreateTable<T>();Di2015NewLine        Type theEntityType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use reflection to get the properties of the generic type (T)Di2015NewLine        PropertyDescriptorCollection theProperties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(theEntityType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Loop through each generic item in the listDi2015NewLine        foreach (T theItem in theList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataRow theRow = theTable.NewRow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Loop through all the propertiesDi2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyDescriptor theProperty in theProperties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Retrieve the value and check to see if it is nullDi2015NewLine                object thePropertyValue = theProperty.GetValue(theItem);Di2015NewLine                if (null == thePropertyValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // The value is null, so we need special treatment, because a DataTable does not like null, but is okay with DBNull.ValueDi2015NewLine                    theRow[theProperty.Name] = DBNull.Value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // No problem, just slap the value inDi2015NewLine                    theRow[theProperty.Name] = theProperty.GetValue(theItem);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            theTable.Rows.Add(theRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return theTable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1408306Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static String Decompress(String zipText) throws IOException {Di2015NewLine    byte[] gzipBuff = Base64.decodeBase64(zipText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ByteArrayInputStream memstream = new ByteArrayInputStream(gzipBuff);Di2015NewLine    GZIPInputStream gzin = new GZIPInputStream(memstream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    final int buffSize = 8192;Di2015NewLine    byte[] tempBuffer = new byte[buffSize ];Di2015NewLine    ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();Di2015NewLine    while ((size = gzin.read(tempBuffer, 0, buffSize)) != -1) {Di2015NewLine        baos.write(tempBuffer, 0, size);Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = baos.toByteArray();Di2015NewLine    baos.close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new String(buffer, "UTF-8");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1409877Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void Receive(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bytesRead = tcpClient.GetStream().EndRead(ar);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //something bad happened. Cleanup requiredDi2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bytesRead != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] charBuffer = utf8Encoding.GetChars(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcpClient.GetStream().BeginRead(buffer, 0, buffer.Length, Receive, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //something bad happened. Cleanup requiredDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //socket closed, I think?Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
1409877Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Send(XmlDocument doc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Send(doc.OuterXml);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void Send(String str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Byte[] sendBuf = utf8Encoding.GetBytes(str);Di2015NewLine        Send(sendBuf);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void Send(Byte[] sendBuf)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tcpClient.GetStream().Write(sendBuf, 0, sendBuf.Length);Di2015NewLine            tcpClient.GetStream().WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine            tcpClient.GetStream().WriteByte(13); //very important to terminate XmlSocket data in this way, otherwise Flash can't read it.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //something bad happened. cleanup?Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
